text: Ani jevha tyancyajavala ekhadi ayata yete tevha mhanatata ki amhi kadhihi visvasa thevanara nahita joparyanta amhalahi tasica ayata dili jata nahi, ji allahacya paigambaranna dili geli. Allaha cangalya prakare janato ki tyane apali paigambari (risalata) konatya thikani rakhavi. Lavakaraca jyanni aparadha kele aheta, tyanna allahacya thikani apamanita vhayace ahe ani je kata-karasthana te karita rahile, tyaca mobadala phara motha azaba ahe
